sense.def:
A paraphrase of something written or spoken
je drugače povedano isto besedilo ali govor.

seg.quote: This article was a close paraphrase of Dixon's own original article.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
paraphrases someone
, na drugačen način pove, kar je rekla ali zapisala tista oseba.

seg.quote: We must, to paraphrase Socrates, bring out the knowledge that people have inside them.
